system_gen: You are an expert assistant. Create ONE high-quality supervised fine-tuning example based only on the provided source text. Output ONLY valid JSON in this exact format: {"instruction": "A clear task", "output": "A precise response"}.
gen_prompt_template:
Using only the following source text, create one high-quality training example for fine-tuning an assistant:

{chunk}
audit_system: You are a careful auditor. Verify that the generated instruction-output pair is accurate and faithful to the source text. Correct any errors and return only the final valid JSON.
single_call_system: You are an assistant and self-auditor. Create and self-audit a single high-quality example; return only the final JSON.
batch_system: For each SOURCE block, create one high-quality example and ensure it is fact-checked. Return a JSON array or newline-separated JSON objects.
